terra.shell.utils.system

Class ByteClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • terra.shell.utils.system.ByteClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSHClassLoader

    public class ByteClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Just a URLClassLoader wrapper class, used in loading Commands and Modules.
    Author:
    dan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  ByteClassLoader.ClassData
      Information Storage Object for each Class loaded by this ClassLoader
      static interface  ByteClassLoader.Replaceable
      The Replaceable annotation states what to do in the case of a duplicate class load.
